title: The Visitor Has Company
description: [A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale]Something’s coming for our trio…But it’s not what they expect!Lea, Andy, and Sean are settling in for a nice quiet evening at home — handcuffs, some lube…But the doorbell rings, announcing an unexpected guest. The Visitor has a visitor, and who knows what that will bring?Danger? Disaster? Wedding bells?For whom? To whom? With whom?The wild conclusion to The Visitor Saga will leave Lea, her boys, and you breathless.(MMF+ ménage à trois erotic romance. FMM, FMF, MF, orgy. Bisexuality. No firemen were harmed in the making of this story — but that doesn’t mean we didn’t mess them up a bit.)This is the seventh story in The Visitor Saga: • The Visitor: A Friendly FMM Ménage Tale* • The Visitor Comes Home: A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale* • The Visitor Comes Again: A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale* • The Visitor Goes to Work: A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale* • The Visitor Entertains: A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale* • The Visitor Takes a Trip: A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale • The Visitor Has Company: A Friendly MMF Ménage Tale * Available in the collection The Visitor Comes to Stay: A Quintet of Friendly MMF Ménage Tales
author: K.D. West
